attributes.system.description:
# Step to reproduce
- Create a new Iteration.
- Collapse the side panel.
- expand the side panel. Then Iteration is no more visible in the side panel.

Update iteration is also not reflected in the side panel after collapsing and expanding the side panel.
attributes.system.description.rendered:
Step to reproduce

  • Create a new Iteration.
  • Collapse the side panel.
  • expand the side panel. Then Iteration is no more visible in the side panel.

Update iteration is also not reflected in the side panel after collapsing and expanding the side panel.
attributes.system.title: Iteration disappear on collapsing and expanding the side panel

attributes.system.description: The goal here will be to verify that each cluster provides the same level of performance and stability for users. User accounts will have to be created and identified with specific clusters.
attributes.system.description.rendered: The goal here will be to verify that each cluster provides the same level of performance and stability for users. User accounts will have to be created and identified with specific clusters.
attributes.system.title: Create/configure EE tests to verify operation of different OSIO clusters

attributes.system.description:
RHOAR Launcher's codebase needs to be understood and document detailed steps (at component level) to migrate this launcher into OSIO work flow.

Part of the EPIC#1623: https://openshift.io/openshiftio/openshiftio/plan?area=AppStack

Source code for RHOAR launcher:

https://github.com/openshiftio/launchpad-frontend
https://github.com/openshiftio/launchpad-backend
https://github.com/fabric8-launch/launchpad-missioncontrol
attributes.system.description.rendered:
RHOAR Launcher's codebase needs to be understood and document detailed steps (at component level) to migrate this launcher into OSIO work flow.

Part of the EPIC#1623: https://openshift.io/openshiftio/openshiftio/plan?area=AppStack

Source code for RHOAR launcher:

https://github.com/openshiftio/launchpad-frontend https://github.com/openshiftio/launchpad-backend https://github.com/fabric8-launch/launchpad-missioncontrol
attributes.system.title: Understand the codebase for RHAOR launcher

attributes.system.description:
If viewed on a laptop, the backlog view shows no more than 8 workitems. Can we add a condensed view to enable users to see more (20?) workitems in the backlog?

https://github.com/ldimaggi/testing/raw/master/1687.png
![Image of Planner](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ldimaggi/testing/master/1687.png)
attributes.system.description.rendered:
If viewed on a laptop, the backlog view shows no more than 8 workitems. Can we add a condensed view to enable users to see more (20?) workitems in the backlog?

https://github.com/ldimaggi/testing/raw/master/1687.png
attributes.system.title: Enhancement - Implement a condensed backlog view - to enable the user to see more than 8 workitems on a laptop

attributes.system.description:
Steps to recreate:

* Load a workitem's detailed view in the browser, for example: https://openshift.io/openshiftio/openshiftio/plan/detail/1676
* Load a different workitem's detail view, for example: https://openshift.io/openshiftio/openshiftio/plan/detail/1677

Observe that ~`13 seconds are required to load the 2nd workitem. Observe in the google chrome networkconsole over 100 requests and ~2MB of data moved to display the 2nd workitem
attributes.system.description.rendered:
Steps to recreate:

  • Load a workitem's detailed view in the browser, for example: https://openshift.io/openshiftio/openshiftio/plan/detail/1676
  • Load a different workitem's detail view, for example: https://openshift.io/openshiftio/openshiftio/plan/detail/1677

Observe that ~`13 seconds are required to load the 2nd workitem. Observe in the google chrome networkconsole over 100 requests and ~2MB of data moved to display the 2nd workitem
attributes.system.title: Approx 13 seconds and 100 requests (2MB) to generate a detailed view of a workitem
A tooltip bubbles for workitems in the board view are rendered behind the top of a column and thus are partially invisible.

attributes.system.description:
Scenario:
Start the WIT server in DEV mode and hit the server's REST "GET /api/login/generate" endpoint.
attributes.system.description.rendered: Scenario: Start the WIT server in DEV mode and hit the server's REST "GET /api/login/generate" endpoint.
attributes.system.title: Create simle performance test for generating auth tokens from WIT server.

attributes.system.description:
Steps to Reproduce - 

1. Select a space
2. Select Plan tab (Analyze Plan Create)
3. Select Backlog
4. Select Create (Analyze Plan Create)
5. Select Plan tab (Analyze Plan Create)
6. Select Backlog
7. The create new WI div has additional (unnecessary) padding.
![plan backlog openshift io 4](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12949454/32365215-fc564e70-c09e-11e7-9f45-6d53fa9f91f8.png)
attributes.system.description.rendered:
Steps to Reproduce -

  1. Select a space
  2. Select Plan tab (Analyze Plan Create)
  3. Select Backlog
  4. Select Create (Analyze Plan Create)
  5. Select Plan tab (Analyze Plan Create)
  6. Select Backlog
  7. The create new WI div has additional (unnecessary) padding.
attributes.system.title: Create new WI div CSS breaks on switching from Create to Plan
